FuncDef: This command defines the range of filter and QoS policy entries that are reserved for shared entries received in Flow-Information AVP via Gx interface (PCC rules - Policy and Charging Control). Thenoform of this command disables the insertion, which will result in a failure of PCC rule installation.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the lowest entry in the range. Values-1 to 2097151.
Specifies the number of entries in the range. Values-1 to 65535.
